description: Smallest number k such that n+k is prime.
comments: Smarandache complementary prime function.a(n) = A007918(n) - n.
references: M. Popescu, V. Seleacu, About the Smarandache Complementary Prime Function, Smarandache Notions Journal, Vol. 7, No. 1-2-3, 1996, 12-22.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
author: R. Muller
extensions: More terms from Joanna S. Bartlett (s1117611(AT)cedarville.edu)
